item.description:
We will walk from Government Center to the Cathedral, making the stations of the cross at churches along the way. When we reach the Cathedral at 11:30, Cardinal Sean O'Malley will join us for the last 2 Stations of the Cross.

Meet us at Government Center at 9:00 and walk with us, or meet us at the Catherdral at 11:30.

Come make reparation to God on Good Friday, the day when Jesus walked and prayed for us.
item.how_to_find_us: We will start on the west side of the plaza, by Cambridge Street. Look for banners and statues.

group.name: Way of the Cross for Life

item.name: Way of the Cross for Life
